Key Match Events: Landon Knack gave up a grand slam in the second inning
Mark Vientos hit a grand slam in the second inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers planned to use a bullpen game to manage their pitching staff
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts reflected on the loss and the challenges faced
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets held a 6-0 lead after the second inning
Max Muncy hit a solo home run in the fifth inning
Others: The game was part of the NLCS and the series was tied 1-1 after two games
